```{r}
library(igraph)
```

Iterated Prisoner's Dillema on a Graph.

```{r}
E <- matrix(c(1,1,2,2,2,2,1,1),4,2)
g <- graph.edgelist(E, directed = TRUE)
E(g)
```

```{r}
for(i in 1:4){
  print(E(g)[i])
}
```
